disease.name: Miraluka Neural Disconnection Syndrome
disease.description: Miraluka Neural Disconnection Syndrome is a neurological disorder specific to Miralukas, characterized by disruptions in neural connectivity leading to cognitive and sensory impairments.

treatment_plans.name: Neurological Evaluation
treatment_plans.description: Conduct a comprehensive neurological evaluation to assess cognitive function, sensory processing, and motor coordination. Neurologists may perform brain imaging scans and specialized tests to diagnose the extent of neural disconnection.

treatment_plans.name: Speech and Language Therapy
treatment_plans.description: Refer individuals to speech and language therapy sessions to address language difficulties and improve communication skills. Therapists can provide exercises and techniques to enhance speech clarity and comprehension.

treatment_plans.name: Cognitive Rehabilitation
treatment_plans.description: Implement cognitive rehabilitation interventions to improve memory, attention, problem-solving, and executive function. Cognitive therapists can provide tailored exercises and strategies to address specific cognitive impairments.

treatment_plans.name: Occupational Therapy
treatment_plans.description: Engage individuals in occupational therapy sessions to address motor coordination problems and sensory processing issues. Occupational therapists can provide adaptive techniques and equipment to enhance independence in daily activities.

treatment_plans.name: Medication Management
treatment_plans.description: Prescribe medications to manage symptoms such as emotional instability, fatigue, and cognitive impairments. This may include antidepressants, stimulants, or cognitive enhancers to improve mood and cognitive function.
